title: Illinois Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Jahari Thomas (June 29, 2024)

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Illinois Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Jahari Thomas (June 29, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act (5 ILCS 140/1 et seq.), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to the arrest of Jahari Thomas on or about June 29, 2024, by the Wheaton Police Department.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Wheaton Police Department personnel during the detention, investigation, and arrest of Jahari Thomas.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the booking time is listed as 12:00 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 10:30 PM on June 28, 2024, to 2:30 AM on June 29, 2024.

I request that the video footage be produced in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, with the least restrictive redaction methods applied only where necessary to comply with specific statutory exemptions, to preserve the full factual integrity of the recordings.

If any portions of the footage are withheld, please provide a detailed written explanation citing the specific exemptions under Illinois law that justify the redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Ashley Jennings (February 27, 2025)

communications.subject: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act Request: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Ashley Jennings (February 27, 2025)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to the arrest of Ashley Jennings on or about February 27, 2025, by the Cranston Police Department under Arrest Number 25-13982-AR.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by Cranston Police Department personnel during the detention, investigation, or arrest of Ashley Jennings in connection with the call for service at 1140 Cranston Street, Cranston, Rhode Island.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the incident occurred at approximately 2:34 PM, I request responsive footage from approximately 1:30 PM to 4:30 PM on February 27, 2025.

If any portions of the requested footage are exempt or confidential, please produce the non-exempt portions and cite the specific legal exemptions justifying any withholding or redaction.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA) Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Katherine Bailey (January 16, 2025)

communications.subject: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act Request: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA) Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Katherine Bailey (January 16, 2025)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) and vehicle dash camera footage related to the arrest of Katherine Bailey on or about January 16, 2025, by the Cranston Police Department.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by Cranston Police Department personnel during the traffic stop, field sobriety testing, detention, and arrest of Katherine Bailey near the Senior Center at 1070 Cranston Street.

All dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in the stop, investigation, or arrest.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the incident occurred at approximately 2:27 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 1:00 AM to 4:00 AM on January 16, 2025.

If any portions of the requested footage are exempt or confidential, please produce the non-exempt portions and cite the specific legal exemptions justifying any withholding or redaction.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Shaelyn Ray (January 12, 2025)

communications.subject: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act Request: Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Shaelyn Ray (January 12, 2025)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act (APRA), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to the arrest of Shaelyn Ray on or about January 12, 2025, by the Cranston Police Department.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Cranston Police Department personnel during the detention, investigation, or arrest of Shaelyn Ray, in connection with a call for service at 301 Oaklawn Avenue, Apartment #201, Cranston, Rhode Island.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the incident occurred at approximately 8:30 PM, I request responsive footage from approximately 7:30 PM to 10:30 PM on January 12, 2025.

If any portions of the requested footage are exempt or confidential, please provide the non-exempt portions and cite the specific legal exemptions justifying any withholding or redaction.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor but request notification if the costs will exceed $50. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
